meanings: put the police on red alert

vlive.korean: 적색... - 더 적색이래. Red color... - She said it's more of a red color. 듣기 View video DIA : [DIA]채연이와 다이아는 지금 드라마 촬영중

vlive.korean: 양파가 몸에 되게 좋대요. - 적색 양파? Onions are good for your body. - Red onions? 듣기 View video INFINITE : 숙성된 인더하이츠배우 규님 또또우
vlive.english: Onions are good for your body. - Red onions?

examples.korean: The emergency sparked a red alert in the coastal city. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 비상사태는 이 해안도시에 적색경보를 촉발했습니 다. Neungyule

examples.korean: The star is a cool red dwarf called Gliese 581 and it is in the constellation of Libra. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 별은 Gliese 581이라 불리는 차가운 적색 왜성이며 천칭 별자리에 (위치해)있다. Neungyule

examples.korean: Yeah. When I cross the avenue just half-way, the green light has already changed to red. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 예, 제가 반쯤거리를 건널 때, 녹색신호등이 이미 적색신호등으로 바뀌었습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yeah. When I cross the avenue just half-way, the green light has already changed to red. Add to Wordbook
